name: Hoperay
description:
Year 20XX

An unknown entity, with the codename "Orbos", has appeared mysteriously on our solar system and is coming towards our loved Earth... with destructive intentions. We already launched an preemptive attack against it, with disastrous results. All our weapons are useless against it...

…But there is a way.

The greatest scientists and engineers of our planet designed in secret a spaceship with capabilities beyond our current imagination. It's on a prototype state but we don´t have more time. This is our last chance.

This is our last ray of hope...

Hoperay is a top-down shooter game focused on a combat against a single big entity. This game was created in 2012 for Ludum Dare #23, with the theme "Tiny World". As the old website disappeared along the games inside (unless you search well), I decided to put this game here, with my other games.

This game is one of those that have a place in my heart, be for the theme or the concept around it. Even up to this day since I made this game. I hope you like it.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • X: Shoot
  • Enter: Pause/Continue
